headline: What The Latest Developments Mean For Indian Energy Exchange's Evolving Valuation Story
summary: Indian Energy Exchange’s latest narrative update leaves its fair value estimate steady at about ₹149.50 per share, even as the assumed discount rate edges up slightly and revenue growth expectations remain broadly unchanged. This mix of stable valuation with a modestly higher cost of equity reflects a market that still sees long term structural potential but is becoming more selective on risk and execution. Stay tuned to understand how you can track these evolving assumptions and keep up with...
